comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Since we already hit the date for alpha.8 milestone, I think we should combine these two releases.
I propose to use "alpha.7" name for the release (so it's continue the sequence of minor pre-releases) and rename current alhpha.9 to alpha.8

cc @HemantMahawar @SandeepSutari @lzybkr

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I'm stuck fixing some PSRP stuff. It would be ideal if I can fix PSRP for this release.
